title: Introducing My New Apartment
desc: Talk about your new apartment, its features, and how you feel about living there.
prompt_en: Describe your new apartment and what you like most about it.
prompt_zh: 描述你的新公寓以及你最喜歡它的哪些地方。
sample_questions: What do you like most about your new apartment?
How is your bedroom and closet?
What appliances are in your kitchen?

title: About My Roommate
desc: Describe your roommate's personality, habits, and your relationship with her.
prompt_en: Tell me about your roommate. What is she like and how do you get along?
prompt_zh: 告訴我你的室友是怎樣的人，你們相處得如何？
sample_questions: What does your roommate look like?
Is your roommate friendly or messy?

title: My College Classes
desc: Share your favorite and least favorite classes, and describe your teachers and classmates.
prompt_en: What are your favorite and least favorite classes? Describe your teachers and classmates.
prompt_zh: 你最喜歡和最不喜歡的課程是什麼？描述你的老師和同學。
sample_questions: What do you like about your biology class?
Why do you find calculus boring?
How are your classmates from different backgrounds?

title: Life Around My Apartment
desc: Talk about the neighborhood, nearby restaurants, and fun activities you enjoy.
prompt_en: Describe the area around your apartment, including places to eat and things to do.
prompt_zh: 描述你公寓附近的環境，包括餐廳和娛樂活動。
sample_questions: What are some good restaurants near your apartment?
What kind of food do you like to eat there?
Are there any fun places or events nearby?

title: My Balcony and Its View
desc: Describe your balcony, how it is decorated, and what you can see from it.
prompt_en: Tell me about your balcony and the view from it.
prompt_zh: 告訴我你的陽台和從那裡看到的景色。
sample_questions: What plants and decorations do you have on your balcony?
What can you see from your balcony?
How does the balcony make you feel?
